dc_title_s: Map of Minnesota : with population and location of principal towns and cities
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:1,287,000] (W 97째--W 90째/N 49째--N 43째). Congressional and township boundaries shown in red and blue respectively. On verso: index of cities and towns with location and population (1905 census). "Our lands are located within a few miles of the richest Iron Mines in the world. Therefore the Farmer has the best markets. The country with in the circle [around Grand Rapids] is very rich and proserous. New mines are just beginning to open up"--advertising text on recto.|54 x 45 centimeters|Scale [1:1,287,000]|General Minnesota Maps
